description: Every year, people come together to celebrate Thanksgiving. This family-oriented holiday is best known for its food and drinks.One of the best cocktails that you could serve at this time is the Pear and Ginger-Sage Champagne Cocktail! They are so delicious, especially when served in a stemless&nbsp;wine glass with a slice of pear on top.
keywords: Pear And Ginger-Sage Champagne Cocktail Recipe
How To Pear And Ginger-Sage Champagne
name: Pear And Ginger-Sage Champagne
recipeIngredient: 2 Whole pears, peeled, cored, and diced
1 Large chunk of ginger, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.name: First, you need to make the syrup. In a saucepan over medium-high heat, combine honey and water. Stir occasionally until mixture reaches boiling point.

recipeInstructions.name: Add the pears, ginger, and sage leaves. Simmer until the mixture has reduced by 1/3. About 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat and let the mixture steep for an additional 10 minutes.
